about_the_game:
Overview

You begin your journey as a simple Viking warrior, living in a small village in the harsh North. Ahead of you lie numerous challenges and events that may elevate you to the heights of glory. By surviving feuds, raids on Frisia and England, you can lead your clan and become a powerful Jarl or even a Konung. But the choice is yours — will you pursue conquest or turn away from the path of destruction to protect peaceful lands?

The game is filled with a variety of stories:

  • Epic battles, where you can achieve warrior’s glory.

  • Romantic moments, bringing warmth to your heart amidst the wars.

Choose one of three paths and shape your destiny, unlocking one of 16 unique endings:

  • Viking-Conqueror: Become a fearsome but just ruler, aiming to live and thrive alongside conquered lands rather than plundering them.

  • Viking-Raider: Follow the path of looting and domination, with a single goal — to conquer everything and everyone.

  • Defender: Turn away from destruction and join the Anglo-Saxon kingdoms, protecting them from invaders.

Every decision you make determines not only your destiny but also the future of kingdoms, nations, and the entire era. Which path will you choose?

Game by the Numbers

  • 300+ story-driven backgrounds

  • 200+ equippable items

  • 190+ character illustrations

  • 70+ engaging quests

  • 16 possible endings

Engage in Three Types of Battles

  • Side-view battles, where you can showcase your warrior skills.

  • Tactical assaults and sieges, to demonstrate your commanding abilities.

  • Strategic battles, where you can unleash your inner tactician.

  • Plus one mini-game.

Historical Foundation

The story begins in 849 AD and covers the events of the first campaign of the "Great Heathen Army" in 850 AD to Kent and Mercia, where you can rewrite the outcome of this invasion and the fate of England itself.
Can you build upon this success and achieve what the Duke of Normandy accomplished two centuries later, uniting England under a single ruler?

The story explores significant events of the time, including:

  • The invasion of Rorik of Jutland in Dorestad and Utrecht (850 AD, modern Netherlands).

  • The invasion of Kent and Mercia (~850 AD).

  • The capture of York in 867 AD.

  • And many other historical events.

In this game, we’ve aimed to treat history with the utmost respect, recreating:

  • The daily life of Vikings, their training, and their equipment.

  • The unique features of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms, including the titles of thanes, historical rulers, and much more.
